column1:
Fear is the "underlying condition" for most of us regarding the emerging coronavirus scare in U.S. 
Fear is slowly spreading. Not a paralyzing fear. Not an alarmist fear. Simply a fear that lurks in the shadows of doubt, uncertainty and lack of information
